Package org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.qptl

Class QPTLUtil

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.qptl.QPTLUtil
public class QPTLUtil
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides some useful methods for processing QPTL formulae.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

    Converts all universal quantifiers to existential quantifiers.

    Converts a QPTL formula into another formula that can be accepted by SPIN.

    Eliminates double negations in a QPTL formula.

    Eliminates a quantified proposition from an automaton.
    static FSA findFSAInRepository​(QPTL f)
    Finds a smallest FSA in the repositories that is equivalent to a specified QPTL formula.
    static java.util.Collection<QPTL> flatten​(QPTL f)
    Returns {f1, f2, ..., fn} for formulae of the form f1 ∧ f2 ∧ ...

    Returns a canonical form of a QPTL formula.
    static java.util.Set<LTL> getFairnessLTL​(LTL ltl)
    Collects sub-formulae that are relevant to fairness requirements, such as always, sometime, and until formulae.
    static java.util.Set<QPTL> getFairnessQPTL​(QPTL qptl)
    Collects sub-formulae that are relevant to fairness requirements, such as always, sometime, and until formulae.
    static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getOperators​(QPTL formula)
    Returns IDs of temporal operators and quantifications in a QPTL formula ordered by their occurrence in the parse tree.

    Returns all previous formulae in a set.
    static java.util.Set<QPTL> getPreviousQPTL​(java.util.Set<QPTL> set)
    Returns all previous formulae in a set.
    static Proposition getPropositionInLiteral​(QPTL lit)
    Returns the proposition in a literal.
    static int getTemporalLength​(QPTL formula)
    Returns the temporal length (the number of temporal operators) of a specified QPTL formula.
    static int getTenseAlternation​(QPTL formula)
    Return the number of alternations of future operators and past operators in a specified QPTL formula.
    static java.util.Set<QPTL> getUntilQPTL​(QPTL qptl)
    Returns all until sub-formulae of a QPTL formula.
    static boolean isCanonicalForms​(QPTL formula)
    Returns true if a QPTL formula is in one of the canonical forms which characterize the classes of the temporal hierarchy.
    static boolean isConvertiblePrenexCanonicalForms​(QPTL formula)
    Returns true if a QPTL formula is in one of the canonical forms which characterize the classes of the temporal hierarchy and the past sub-formulae of the QPTL formula are all convertible to prenex normal form.
    static boolean isConvertiblePrenexGuaranteeFormula​(QPTL formula)
    Returns true if a QPTL formula is a guarantee formula in the form <> p where p is a past formula convertible to prenex normal form.
    static boolean isConvertiblePrenexObligationFormula​(QPTL formula)
    Returns true if a QPTL formula is an obligation formula in the form ∧([] p ∨ <> q) where p and q are past formulae convertible to prenex normal form.
    static boolean isConvertiblePrenexPastFormula​(QPTL formula)
    Returns true if a formula is convertible to a pure past formula in prenex normal form.
    static boolean isConvertiblePrenexPersistenceFormula​(QPTL formula)
    Returns true if a QPTL formula is a persistence formula in the form <>[] p where p is a past formula convertible to prenex normal form.
    static boolean isConvertiblePrenexReactivityFormula​(QPTL formula)
    Returns true if a QPTL formula is a reactivity formula in the form ∧([]<> p ∨ <>[] q) where p and q are past formulae convertible to prenex normal form.
    static boolean isConvertiblePrenexRecurrenceFormula​(QPTL formula)
    Returns true if a QPTL formula is a recurrence formula in the form []<> p where p is a past formula convertible to prenex normal form.
    static boolean isConvertiblePrenexSafetyFormula​(QPTL formula)
    Returns true if a QPTL formula is a safety formula in the form [] p where p is a past formula convertible to prenex normal form.
    static boolean isGuaranteeFormula​(QPTL formula)
    Returns true if a QPTL formula is a guarantee formula in the form <> p where p is a past formula.
    static boolean isObligationFormula​(QPTL formula)
    Returns true if a QPTL formula is an obligation formula in the form ∧([] p ∨ <> q) where p and q are past formulae.
    static boolean isPersistenceFormula​(QPTL formula)
    Returns true if a QPTL formula is a persistence formula in the form <>[] p where p is a past formula.

    Returns true if a QPTL formula is in one of the canonical forms which characterize the classes of the temporal hierarchy and the past sub-formulae of the QPTL formula are all in prenex normal form.

    Returns true if two formulae are syntactically equal with consideration of commutativity and negation.

    Parses a QPTL formula from a string and prompts an error message if there is any parsing error.

      Returns:
      the parsed QPTL formula

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Throws:

    • elimQuantification

      public static void elimQuantification​(Proposition p, Automaton aut)
      Eliminates a quantified proposition from an automaton.
      Parameters:
      p - the quantified variable to be eliminated
      aut - an ω-automaton

    • findFSAInRepository

      public static FSA findFSAInRepository​(QPTL f)
      Finds a smallest FSA in the repositories that is equivalent to a specified QPTL formula. The equivalence is checked by pure formula matching or formula unification. What repositories are used depends on the user preference Preference.UseLocalRepositoryKey and Preference.UseRemoteRepositoryKey. The mode of matching formulae comes from the user preference org.svvrl.goal.core.Preference#UseRepositoryKey.
      Parameters:
      f - a QPTL formula
      Returns:
      a smallest FSA in the repositories that is equivalent to f, or null if there is no such automaton in the repository

    • getCanonicalForm

      public static QPTL getCanonicalForm​(QPTL formula)
      Returns a canonical form of a QPTL formula.
      Parameters:
      formula - a QPTL formula
      Returns:
      a canonical form of the QPTL formula

    • getTemporalLength

      public static int getTemporalLength​(QPTL formula)
      Returns the temporal length (the number of temporal operators) of a specified QPTL formula.
      Parameters:
      formula - a QPTL formula
      Returns:
      the temporal length of the input QPTL formula

    • getOperators

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getOperators​(QPTL formula)
      Returns IDs of temporal operators and quantifications in a QPTL formula ordered by their occurrence in the parse tree. Note that boolean operators are excluded.
      Parameters:
      formula - a QPTL formula
      Returns:
      IDs of temporal operators and quantifications in formula ordered by their occurrence in the parse tree

      Returns:

    • convertForallToExists

      public static QPTL convertForallToExists​(QPTL formula)
      Converts all universal quantifiers to existential quantifiers. For example, "A x : f(x)" will become "~ E x : ~ f(x)". Note that if a negation does not precede an existential quantified formula, the negation will be pushed as deep as possible.
      Parameters:
      formula - a QPTL formula
      Returns:
      a QPTL formula obtained from formula by replacing "A x : f(x)" with "~ E x : ~ f(x)"

    • convertToSPIN

      public static QPTL convertToSPIN​(QPTL formula) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Converts a QPTL formula into another formula that can be accepted by SPIN.
      Parameters:
      formula - a QPTL formula
      Returns:
      a formula congruent to the input formula
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input formula has past operators or quantifications

    • flatten

      public static java.util.Collection<QPTL> flatten​(QPTL f)
      Returns {f1, f2, ..., fn} for formulae of the form f1 ∧ f2 ∧ ... ∧ fn or f1 ∨ f2 ∨ ... ∨ fn.
      Parameters:
      f - a QPTL formula
      Returns:
      {f1, f2, ..., fn} if the formula is of the form f1 ∧ f2 ∧ ... ∧ fn or f1 ∨ f2 ∨ ... ∨ fn

    • getPropositionInLiteral

      public static Proposition getPropositionInLiteral​(QPTL lit)
      Returns the proposition in a literal.
      Parameters:
      lit - a literal
      Returns:
      the proposition in the literal or null if lit is not a literal

    • getTenseAlternation

      public static int getTenseAlternation​(QPTL formula)
      Return the number of alternations of future operators and past operators in a specified QPTL formula.
      Parameters:
      formula - an QPTL formula
      Returns:
      the number of alternations of future operators and past operators in the formula

    • isWeaklyEqual

      public static boolean isWeaklyEqual​(QPTL f, QPTL g)
      Returns true if two formulae are syntactically equal with consideration of commutativity and negation. For example, p &and; (~ [] q) is weakly equal to (&lt;&gt; ~ q) &and; p.
      Parameters:
      f - a formula
      g - a formula
      Returns:
      true if two formulae are syntactically equal with consideration of commutativity and negation
